value:
Looking at that pond in the middle of
the courtyard, I can't help but think of
the time I dropped my axe in Verdane...

Prince Alfonse is a good man. He can
seem detached, but he'd never let
hunger for power cloud his judgment.

So, when do we head out? I've got
nothing but time on my hands here.
Come find me if you decide to go.

What would you say if I told you I was
going to ask that girl to tea? Wait, no!
Come back, $Nu!

I guess you know my secret... Look,
even the sharpest fighters must study
now and then. Keep this between us.

You must be $Nu.
I am Lex! I'm sure you'll be good to
$Nf and company.

Now do you understand the extent of
my strength? By the crusader Nál,
I swear to face and disrupt our foes!

I know I look a little rough around the
edges. Truth is, I come from an elite
family, so you can expect greatness.

Hmph, bad luck can strike anyone,
I suppose... No matter, though!
Let's move on to the next one!

A gift for me? So, it finally happened...
You've fallen for me, huh? I knew it.
It's cute when you blush like that.

I'm Lex, a mere warrior with a mighty
axe. I don't know your story, but you
can bet you'll remember mine!

I teased Azelle into leaving home. To
give him a hard time, sure, but...really
I wanted an excuse to leave myself.$k$pYou see, being the descendant of
a crusader may sound excellent, but
it's only caused a rift in my family.$k$pI wanted to escape the sinister
gaze of my father and brother
and live as I please for a while...$k$pBut the goddess of war had other
plans for me. Now I'm helping my
friend fight for the love of his life.$k$pHe has grown strong, and I have
found true kinship in the comrades
who fought beside me in battle.$k$pIf you ever decide to take that first
leap to make a change in your life,
know I will fight alongside you too.

Take this!
ぐっ…
Oh no...!
This too is fate.
I'll show you what I can do.
You're an unfriendly one.
This isn't about you.
I have no luck.
Sigh...
I'm Lex from Dozel. I'm sure we'll be fast friends.
You trying to challenge me to a fight?
Arvis is a total mystery. He never seemed like a bad person, so why would he...
Azelle carries quite the torch for Lady Edain! Heh, what a cute kid.
I once dropped an iron axe into a lake. A goddess appeared and gave me a brave axe in return! True story!
My father has taken so many innocent lives. I believe he'll get what he's owed.
If you're the one who's asking me, I'll do all that I can.
They won't win.
What a nuisance.
Not a problem.
